tasks.task: Understand the historical and current role of dogs in agriculture.
subtasks: Recognize the evolution of dogs' roles from hunting and gathering to herding, pest control, and guarding.
Identify herding breeds and their intelligence and agility in managing livestock.
Recognize terriers and their purpose in pest control for crops.
Acknowledge guardian dogs and their role in protecting livestock from predators.
Appreciate the bond between farmers and dogs and their impact on productivity.

tasks.task: Recognize the adaptation of working dogs for modern farming.
subtasks: Understand how working dogs continue to be critical in contemporary agriculture.
Note the versatility of working dogs in improving efficiency on homesteads globally.

tasks.task: Familiarize oneself with operating a pesticide sprayer.
Transition to using advanced agricultural technology.
subtasks: - Understanding how to properly mix the formula with the sprayer (SUBTASK 2.1).
- Ensuring accurate and even application of the formula to crops (SUBTASK 2.2).
- Troubleshooting minor issues like leaks and making adjustments (SUBTASK 2.3).
- Recognizing the need for equipment replacement and the reasons for upgrading (SUBTASK 3.1).
- Conducting thorough research and comparison of different sprayers (SUBTASK 3.2).
- Purchasing a new, efficient sprayer and participating in its integration (SUBTASK 3.3).
- Collaborating on the testing and adjustment of the new equipment (SUBTASK 3.4).

tasks.task: Familiarize oneself with operating a pesticide sprayer.
Transition to using advanced agricultural technology.
Familiarize oneself with operating a pesticide sprayer.
subtasks: Understand the components and operation of a pesticide sprayer.
Learn how to correctly mix the formula with the appropriate ratios.
Demonstrate proficiency in spraying, ensuring even coverage.
Recognize and troubleshoot minor malfunctions, like leaks.
Follow safety protocols while operating the equipment.

tasks.task: Transition to using advanced agricultural technology.
subtasks: Recognize the need for equipment replacement after prolonged use.
Research and compare different sprayer models, considering efficiency and cost.
Make a purchasing decision after consulting with experts.
Plan for the integration of new equipment into the existing system.
Participate in testing and adjusting the new sprayer for optimal performance.
